In this game you will do this.

1) Check every profile
2) Report everyone
3) Hate every country

5) Voice_Enable 0
6) Ask to get kicked from competitive game because you lost pistol round

9) 10/10
10) Rush b
11) The game taught me how to be racist

- By far a masterpiece of a game -

Es ist ein Super Produkt, viele Tolle Spieler und Modies. Leider gibt es auch viele Hacker / Cheater was es ein bisschen erschwierigt einen hohen Rang zu erreichen. Ich fände es super wenn man bei Wettkampf / Wingman im gleichstand steht, eine extra Runde hinzugefügt bekommt. Danke für ihre Aufmerksamkeit, Tolles Spiel.

Bom, o jogo em si é muito top, mas as vezes um jogo tao bom como esse acaba. Por existirem alguns jogadores com wall hackers. admins deveriam estar no jogo e caso pegar o jogador usando o mesmo deveria banilo. Mas pelo q vejo n acontece  muito disso pois vejo wall hackers em ambundacia no jogo e nada e feito, mas enfim o jogo ainda é um jogo bom. tomara q n acabe como outros q acabaram por causa de jogadores querendo tirar vantagens com os outros. Obrg.

yeah so this girl on my team was using the lads to get awp drops every round and then blanking use the entire game, not happy. Cracked a stella, hit the wife, sold the dog on ebay and moved to norway where she lived, been following here for around 2 weeks now. Got some good intel on her day to day life. But now because of that corona virus shit im stuck in my hotel room looking at her steam profile pic. Not happy about the content of this game, the birds dont even speak english!
